statements: SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, behavior_score, preferred_marketing_channel FROM customer_segments WHERE age > 25
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_segments WHERE behavior_score < 50
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT behavior_score, location FROM customer_segments WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, age, preferred_marketing_channel FROM customer_segments WHERE age < 30
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_segments WHERE behavior_score >= 70 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_segments WHERE gender = 'Male' AND preferred_marketing_channel = 'Email' ORDER BY behavior_score ASC;
SELECT customer_id, location, behavior_score FROM customer_segments WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND behavior_score > 50 ORDER BY location ASC, behavior_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_score, preferred_marketing_channel FROM customer_segments WHERE location LIKE '%York%' AND preferred_marketing_channel NOT LIKE '%Social%' ORDER BY behavior_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, behavior_score FROM customers WHERE behavior_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_age_start, target_age_end FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' AND city='New York' ORDER BY behavior_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, behavior_score FROM customers WHERE city='Chicago' AND age >= 25;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age ASC, city;
SELECT c.*, m.campaign_name FROM customers c JOIN marketing_campaigns m ON c.city=m.target_city WHERE c.behavior_score > 70 ORDER BY c.behavior_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customers WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY age_group DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM behavior WHERE online_activity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT gender, AVG(income) AS avg_income FROM customers GROUP BY gender;

SELECT c.customer_id, d.age_group, b.subscription_status FROM customers c INNER JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id INNER JOIN behavior b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE b.online_activity > 5;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;

SELECT c.customer_id, d.marital_status, b.purchase_history FROM customers c LEFT JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id LEFT JOIN behavior b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE d.children_count > 0;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, income, occupation FROM demographics WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_score, satisfaction_rating FROM behavior WHERE loyalty_score > 4 AND satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE amount >= 100.00;
SELECT first_name, last_name, education_level, occupation FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_score, purchase_frequency, satisfaction_rating FROM customers JOIN behavior ON customers.customer_id = behavior.customer_id WHERE loyalty_score > 50;
SELECT customers.customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT customers.first_name, behaviors.behavior_type FROM customers JOIN behaviors ON customers.customer_id = behaviors.customer_id WHERE behavior_type = 'loyal';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND gender = 'Female';
